mapper.insert: insert into Schedule(userNo, modDt, week, status, startHour, startMinute, endHour, endMinute) values (${userNo}, #{schedule.modDt}, ${schedule.week}, #{schedule.status}, ${schedule.startTime.hour}, ${schedule.startTime.minute}, ${schedule.endTime.hour}, ${schedule.endTime.minute});
mapper.select: select b.statusNo from Schedule as a join Status as b on a.status = b.status where a.week=${week} and ${hour} between a.startHour and a.endHour and ${minute} between a.startMinute and a.endMinute and b.userNo=${userNo};
